en.sc1: We will add the value 15 to the end of the list.
en.sc2: Create a new Node with value 15 and null for both the next and prev fields.
en.sc3: If the list is empty, the new node is both the head and tail.
en.sc4: Otherwise, the new node will be the new tail.
en.sc5: Set the next field of the current tail to point to the new node.
en.sc6: Set the prev field of the new node to point to the current tail.
en.sc7: Set the tail pointer to the new node.
